text: The Prize Baby is a 1915 American silent comedy film featuring Oliver Hardy. ==Cast== * Oliver Hardy - Bill, the Prize Baby (as Babe Hardy) * Raymond McKee - Pip * Billy Bowers - Boots * Frances Ne Moyer - Florence ==See also== * Oliver Hardy filmography ==External links== * Category:1915 films Category:American silent short films Category:American films Category:American black-and-white films Category:1915 comedy films Category:1915 short films Category:Films directed by Jerold T. Hevener Category:American comedy films Category:Comedy short films
title: The Prize Baby
